transcript: Ah, see, I don't care what you do, see. You could paint yourself green and run naked through the palace-fen-dom. And run off with all the men in the world. I shouldn't say a word, just as long as you love me, best.

segments.text: Ah, see, I don't care what you do, see.
You could paint yourself green and run naked through the palace-fen-dom.
And run off with all the men in the world.
I shouldn't say a word, just as long as you love me, best.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Oh See, I don't care what you do, see.  You can paint yourself green and run naked through the Place Vendome and run off with all of the men of the world.  I shan't say a word, just as long as you love me best.
